name: The Nightmare Room
description:
A room with an undefined shape try to crush your soul, run, jump, and use the power of light to escape this nightmare in this short 2D platformer.

Ludum Dare page

/!\ IMPORTANT EDIT /!\

I have fix lag and bugs so please make sure you download the v1_01lagfix version for your OS. I've also added a MACOSX build, if you have one or a Linux OS please tell me if it works correctly. I let the buggy version published in time for the Ludum Dare disponible to show that i'm not cheating, I have add nothing to the game, just make it playable. Enjoy ! =)
